name: Show do Milhão
summary:
Now you can have the most beloved Brazilian trivia show in the palm of your hand! With Show do Milhão, you can:
- Play with Silvio Santos directly from your cell phone or tablet!
- Give a show of knowledge and put yourself to the test in an electrifying challenge!
- Have fun and learn new things at the same time!
- Live the full experience of the TV show with the help of college students and cards to get further in the Ranking.
- Collect coins and get advantages!
- Enter the competition with other players in an overall ranking and more...
- Have fun with your friends answering varied questions and be number #1!

videos.name: TV commercial
videos.title: Aplicativo Show do Milhão - Baixe grátis e ganhe cupons para concorrer a prêmios
